name: White Nothing
description:
White Nothing is a shooter with a side view, the player needs to reach the end of the level and survive in the battles with the enemies
Brutal and bloody story about the life of a German soldier during Second World War in the rear of the Red Army. It's a harsh Russian winter, both armies are on the verge of survival.
The game has non-standard shooting mechanics: bullets have mass and fall under the force of gravity. You'll have to work hard on the skill of aiming.
The gameplay will present you the opportunity to become a member of the brutal battles inspired by the pages of history.
